name: Podnewsdailypodcastingnews
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, what's in the news?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Podnews has your daily briefing for podcasting and on-demand, from the industry all over the world.

Listen to us every day: we're less than two minutes and we're all you need to know.

Just add us to your flash briefing in your Alex app, and listen by asking "Alexa, what's in the news?"

New episodes appear daily before 7.00am Eastern, Monday to Friday.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
